text: The 1985 World Table Tennis Championships – Women's Singles was the 38th edition of the women's singles championship. Cao Yanhua defeated Geng Lijuan in the final by three sets to one, to win the title. ==Results== ==See also== List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== \- Category:1985 in women's table tennis
title: 1985 World Table Tennis Championships – Women's Singles
